Hercules.Distance: 20.62 ly, 6.32 pc (i.e., distance to its nearest star, Gliese 661)
Hercules.Notes: The constellation Hercules is named after the Roman mythological hero, which was adapted from the Greek hero "Heracles". Its brightest star is __.
captions: The constellation Hercules as it can be seen by the naked eye.
Traditional view of the Hercules constellation highlighting the quadrangle which forms the Keystone asterism.
